name: Buttons tweed blazer
description: A stylish and sophisticated tweed blazer with button details. Perfect for formal occasions.

name: Flowy striped skirt
description: A flowy striped skirt that adds a touch of elegance and charm to your outfit. Ideal for summer days.

name: Cotton T-Shirt
description: A comfortable and breathable cotton t-shirt that is perfect for everyday wear. Available in various colors.

name: Slim striped pocket shirt
description: A slim-fit shirt with stylish striped patterns and a convenient pocket. Suitable for both casual and formal occasions.

name: Fit micro corduroy shirt
description: A fitted corduroy shirt made from soft and durable microfiber material. Perfect for colder seasons.

name: Tropical Kimono
description: A vibrant and colorful tropical kimono that adds a touch of exotic flair to your wardrobe. Great for beach vacations.

name: Contrasting sunglasses
description: Stylish sunglasses with contrasting frames and high-quality lenses that provide optimal UV protection. A must-have accessory for sunny days.

name: Water resistant backpack
description: A durable and water-resistant backpack with ample storage space and comfortable straps. Ideal for outdoor adventures.
